lead_paragraph: Isha Johansen, the president of Sierra Leone’s soccer association, is one of just a handful of women in the world to have held such a post.

headline.print_headline: War, Disease and Scandal Test Sure-Footed Soccer Chief in Sierra Leone
headline.main: War, Disease and Scandals Test Soccer Chief in Sierra Leone

snippet: Isha Johansen, the president of Sierra Leone’s soccer association, is one of just a handful of women in the world to have held such a post.
abstract: Profile of Isha Johansen, president of Sierra Leone Soccer Assn; Johansen is one of few women in world to have become president of their nation's soccer association, and she has had tumultuous several months as she has been removed from job by government, reinstated after intervention by FIFA and then had to confront challenge of having most of teams in domestic soccer league create new league of their own.
